law.text: An unauthorized alteration or filling in of a blank in a bill of lading leaves the bill enforceable according to its original tenor.
law.history: Repealed and reenacted 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 132, sec. 22, effective July 12, 2012. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 77, sec. 7-306, effective July 1, 1960.
